text: 21:44 Aisaia 8:14-15; 60:12; Daniel 2:44-45; Sekaraia 12:3; 1 Pita 2:8Eghtɨ gumazir manam dagɨar kam gisɨn irɨghɨva, an aghariba mɨsarighiregham. Eghtɨ dagɨar kam gumazitam gisɨn irɨghɨva, bar anemɨsararigham.”21:44 Baibelɨn fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, akar ves 44ɨn aven itiba, Matyu da osirizir puvatɨ, ti gumazir igharazim gɨn da osiri. Nɨ Luk 20:18ɨn gan.
